question: Which one of these is a JavaScript package manager?

answers.c: It has a fixed class name

question: What do you mean by nameless objects?

answers.a: An object created by using the new keyword.
answers.b: An object of a superclass created in the subclass.
answers.c: An object without having any name but having a reference.
answers.d: An object that has no reference.

question: Which package contains the Random class?

Which option is false about the final keyword?

answers.a: A final method cannot be overridden in its subclasses.
answers.b: A final class cannot be extended.
answers.c: A final class cannot extend other classes.
answers.d: A final method can be inherited.
